import React, { useContext } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { ThemeContext, themes } from 'components/context/themeContext'; import '../DateCalendar.scss'; const CalendarDaysForm = ({ prevYear, prevMonth, getMonth, getYear, nextMonth, nextYear, dayNames, days, resetDate }) => { const { theme } = useContext(ThemeContext); const checkThemes = theme === themes.light ? {color:"black"} : {color:"white"} return ( <> {/* Month selector */}
« ᐊ {/* {this.getMonthName(this.state.month)} */} {getMonth} {/* {" " + this.state.year} */} {" " + getYear} onClick={nextMonth}> ᐅ onClick={nextYear}> »
{/* Days grid */}
{dayNames}
{days}
) } CalendarDaysForm.propTypes = {} export default CalendarDaysForm
